text: Yishun Pond Park is beautiful in the morning, with a peaceful atmosphere and a stunning sunrise over the pond. It’s perfect for a quiet walk, jog, or just enjoying nature. The cool breeze and calm surroundings make it a great way to start the day.

🌿Yishun Pond Park is situated next to Khoo Teck Puat Hospital.
The unmissable Yishun Pond is the Park's centrepiece.
🌳A well kept pathway amidst lush greenery runs along the perimeter of the clean and serene pond.
🏃The pond park serve as a recreational spot for the residents.
💦The pond located at the low lying area also act as a water collection point from Yishun New Town.
🌁The Park is linked to Yishun Park via an elevated long bridge.
The connecting bridge is jointed to a Lookout Tower that one can climb up to the top for a panoramic view of the surrounding area and the Pond.
🚍Yishun Pond Park is easily accessible by public transport.
Bus 103 & 812 stops right in front of the Park.
Board bus from Yishun Interchange.

Easy walk along the pond and you can spot birds and butterflies. The mushrooms are a pleasant surprise for my walk this morning. If you like to cover a longer distant, you can cross the bridge to Yishun Park and maybe eat at the nearby hawker center.

Vibrant surroundings with lush greenery pond-park. Lovely shimmering water during sunsets which is nice to the eyes. The well maintained walking path that meander around the pond provide a perfect setting for strolls or jogging.
I spotted some wildlife enjoying nature in their own habitat.

This is one of the most beautiful parks used for jogging, walk, exercise, bird watchers and nature seekers. So easy to find wildlife, I spotted so many birds and a monitor lizard. The hospital is perfectly located and provides for amazing photo opportunities. I wish I could catch some otters but that’s for another time.
